EngineerFlux: Oh, hi! I'm the resident engineer here. I've been building a time machine in my spare time, but I need a flux capacitor to complete it.
EngineerIntro: If you bring me the flux capacitor, I will finally complete my time machine.
EngineerPlace: Great! Now you can go back in time and visit places you've already been to.
EngineerTip: Don't forget that you can get back to the future at any time.
